title: Close to the Beach Land in Kirinda Tourism Area
details:
Valuable 280 perches land in Tissa, Kirinda. It very close to famous beautifull kirinda beach in sri lanka. 20 meters to the beach, There is a calm and quiet environment, This land is situated on the Kirinda, This land is suitable for tourism hotel project. 4.5km to Kirinda junction & Yala safari jeep tours, 16km to Yala national park, 16km to Tissa town, 30km to Kataragama, very well road access. water/electricity available.
* very clear document.
